###################
sphinx-autofixture
###################

.. start short_desc

**Sphinx autodocumenter for pytest fixtures.**

.. end short_desc


.. start shields

Installation
--------------

.. start installation

``sphinx-autofixture`` can be installed from PyPI.

To install with ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ python -m pip install sphinx-autofixture

.. end installation
